title: The X-Files (TV series): Did Mulder and Scully ever have sex?

og.title: The X-Files (TV series): Did Mulder and Scully ever have sex?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 9): 
> 


Yes they did.   It is implied in the episode  "all things" and also confirmed by a villain (the mustached magnetite guy) who says he has been watching scully for a while.   He says he knows her blood type,  her clothing size,  her real hair color,  and that he was surprised...
